text: Gaston, I’ll DM you the details
hi <!channel> - i realized late last night that my standing invite for stand up expired. will send a new invite for stand up starting tomorrow, but please check in over slack today.
I see joel typing. So I will let him go first

* Got a ton of power management work done on Friday afternoon. Cap is now sleeping almost all the time. Left it overnight and the battery was still nearly full.
* Spent some time over the weekend reading the D1000 power optimization papers and programmer’s manual to understand how deeper sleep modes work. Makes sense, and should be pretty straightforward to change. Those updates will give us months on a charge.
* Spending today heads-down on getting BrandLab work finished, so no Sommely work for me. Slackable with questions.
* Still waiting on hardware. We’re ready whenever they are. {yawn}
* Big wins last week were from Lee on fade routines, so I’ll punt it to him...

- Got the pushbutton working again. It will now fade the LEDs on and off
- Going to continue working on the color fading today in the morning. 
-Afternoon will be spent mostly on Little Bits proposal stuff

* Finished video screen stuff
* Got email creds from Marce
* Started work on landing page social media
* Finished settings screen
* Will block some time to finish packaging today

Intel is interested in interviewing a few of us about Sommely.  It’s for a blogpost that’ll be promoted by Intel IoT. I’ll get more info, but wanted to share that despite the hw issues, they’re still very excited about it.
We have pretty colors to show off now
